person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: I can introduce you to Bruno, the mindful bear! He’s great at helping folks unwind and get some restful sleep. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some tips from him to help me unwind and sleep better.
animal_say: Alright, here comes Bruno, our friendly bear mindfulness expert! He’ll share some amazing tips to help you unwind and drift off to dreamland!
